lines.translation: I am pleased and all is well
Spirits now I call to heal you
Men and women all will heal
I am pleased to be with you here
In my visions I'm with you
I call you to this healing place
I call the spirits to heal you
With this prayer I will heal you
Spirits of the plants shall come
They all dance among us now
With their joyous dance they heal
To you all I give this prayer
Hear you now the words I sing
I am healing it right now
I go to where the illness starts
With my strength I heal you
I seek to name your illness
I search to clean your body now
I sing all full of joy
With my hands I will heal you
I search to treat your body now
With this I now will heal you
For I have found your illness
Yes I know from where it comes
Spirits come to help me see
I will seek your illness now
In my mouth upon my tongue
With this song I heal you now
that will heal you from your ills
I am healing all your pain
Now the healing is all done
So don't be afraid – Have faith in God
Yet we know of other worlds
We, like healing plants can fly
Spirits come and sing with us / So that we can be prepared

alternative_translation.label: Alternative Translation
alternative_translation.note: works best with the alternative melody

lines.translation: Of the healing plants and trees / Doctors of the plants and trees / Come and join our ceremony / Come to heal us please
Kingly spirits of the forest / Queenly spirits of the trees
We will come and talk to you
Putting the world into place / With the sound of our voice / Spirits come and sing with us / So that we may change the world
We send our prayers up to god
Singing to heal ourselves / Singing to heal the world / Singing to bring great change
With the cushma of my diet
The cushma of the plants I dieted
I put it on to wear it and protect myself
And the crown of my diets
Of the plants I carry inside of me
I wear it to protect and guide me
And to the top of the tree as well
I prepare to go there and work
With my words and singing I seat myself there
In the top of the tree I work and sing through my pipe
This great machine of the plants
Through the magnetic resonance of my machine
And in the powerful singing that flows through me
I seat myself here in the center of my machine
Sitting myself here to work and sing
The dark energies that swirl around us
I fan these away with the great winds of the plants
To clean them and purify them
And to end all bad connections
And take them out from myself and you
I am taking out the bad
From your body it will go
I am taking out the bad
From your spirit it will go
I will take it all out
from your body all the bad
And it comes to all of us
Like the clear sound of a bell
Its soft tone helps me to heal
And keep removing all the bad
I will heal you and be done
Like the clear sound of the bell
Its soft tone helps me to heal
I pray with all my heart
and my powers go to you
With the song of my path
I'm going to end my diet
I'm going to protect my body
with the protection of the plants
I'm going to receive the energy
protecting my body with an arkana
With the song of my path
With the air of the plant doctors (Noyarao)
To sing from the trunk and throne
Now I am free to do my work / I am free to heal and see / I am free to do my work / I am free to heal and see
That let me do my work / That let me heal and see
Completion is near / Completion is here
As a doctor of the plants
And with power and grace I treat
Power of spirit in my hand
I plant doctors into me / I plant doctors into you
With the power of the doctor I will heal your body
This is the place to be
The best medicine country / And in this country I'm a doctor
First I'm going to give you the mareacion
and the machine of the effects
I place the antennae of my icaro line
Like the ones on my clothes
With my connection, adorned with designs
With the Gods of the plants
To free you from the bad paths
With my power I will clean
Although before it was not this way
For this I bring the spirits here
In this way I will help you
And even though your friends are far away
Those that want to be cured
I will work with them or
The Doctors are cleaning me of illness
In my visions and my mareacion
I will heal you and fill you with the power of the plants
We, the Doctors, are helping you in this way
We are opening a world of visions
through God's will and God's energy
And descends as rays of light
My energies are like sweet smelling perfumes
The female masters of the plants made them this way
And the messenger birds as well
That leads to the illuminated visions of God
I talk to the messenger birds who tell me what they see
With my power and airs I will design the world
The sky people descend like aliens
I will arrive at an ocean
I arrive in heaven / I purify you all
And here I walk and converse with aliens
To adorn our bodies with patterns
To adorn our bodies with designs
And these designs signify that we are strong
We call to the plant spirits
We call to the gods of Noyarao
They come in masses to us now
They come with their icaros and sounds
We call to the people of the Anaconda
You are with the lines of the Anaconda
You are in the spirit world
You are with the machine of the mareacion
We'll arrive in the heavens / we travel in other dimensions
Where we can be as we really are
We'll arrive at the door of heaven
The door of the spirit world
The door of the spirit world
I slowly, carefully enter the spirit world, step by step
I transform into medicine and enter your body
I transform into plants / I give you energy of my diets
I'm in the world of medicinal plants
With the medicine, ideas and world of god
I speak to the plants / I build the connection to god
I ask for their power / from here I know how to heal
Their connection and their healing bell
The wind of your connection rings like a healing bell
I will open the immense world of Noyarao
The world of the gods of Noyarao
You are connecting to the world of god
I will care for you, I will raise you up healthy
I will remove your bad spirits and energy
I am cleaning and washing your body
I am going to diagnose you
I have released the bad spirits, I am leaving you free
I have walked where the Noyarao world ends
From there the people of Noaya Rao came to heal you
They came to be in our ceremony
They were happy because they saw you healthy
With that vision I will connect you
I go to a wonderful world
I am seeing everything in you
Your body, your energy and your connection

alternative_translation.label: Alternative Translation
alternative_translation.note: works best with the alternative melody

lines.translation: Spirits of the plants and trees

lines.text: Listen I will care for you

lines.translation: Ride your lines all through the trees
I connect it to my body
I build a bridge with it to my body
Healing with the words of my song
Your sadness that I see now

title: Kate Yonparibanon
note: Whilst learning this icaro you may sing it multiple times through, however in 'normal' ceremony conditions it should only be sung through once.

lines.translation: With these I surround us with protection
With all these I surround us with protection
With all these I surround us with protection
I wear my snake around my neck
Are placed in a cross in front of me
And I activate them with the words of my song

title: Nocon Yora Meabo
description: When in trouble, crossed, being attacked etc

lines.translation: I am cleaning and taking away
My words/speech (that have been affected negatively)
The bad things I am experiencing (in my mareacion),
The line of my diet sins.
I wash them with the blood of God
Blood that is exists beyond sin
I am connecting to the diets of the people of god
All of our energy lines and diets
Opening the worlds of the visions
Connecting you and walking along your lines
These things are now well connected
I am building a bridge to the diets of god
Connecting and transforming your whole diet.
I call the world of Noyarao to come
So that we are well connected
The boat of your diets have arrived
All the things of your diet
Liberating with the words of my song
I build a bridge to your mareacion
And a bridge to the world of your visions
Now that this kano is established
I am calling the spirit of a patient here
Calling them with the words of my song
And from here I perceive it.
That you have gathered to yourself
To the things I have seen in your body
